about_the_game:
Get Ready to Defend Against the Mischievous Hobgoblins!

In Hobgoblins Against Dwarfs, it's time to channel your inner strategist and build the ultimate defence against the relentless Hobgoblins invaders! Craft your defence strategy using a mix of formidable Dwarven Towers and an elite squad, then brace yourself for an epic showdown!

What Makes Us stand Out:

This isn't your average tower defence game – we've sprinkled it with our special magic to keep you hooked! Expect regular updates packed with new characters, features, and gameplay tweaks, ensuring Hobgoblins Against Dwarfs remains a household favorite for strategy enthusiasts.

Features to Look Forward to:

  • Bosses: Prepare to face off against mighty Boss Hobgoblins that will put your defences to the ultimate test.
  • Hunts: Dive deep into the lore of the Dwarfs through captivating hunts designed to unravel tales and unveil secrets.
  • Goodie Shop: Rack up Coins to unlock a treasure trove of cosmetic items, allowing you to personalize your Dwarfs, Hobgoblins, animations, music, and more!

Gear Up For Battle:

Choose from a variety of mighty Dwarven Towers, each boasting three upgrade paths and special abilities to help you fend off the pesky invaders. Unlock and customize your Dwarven squad with signature upgrades and unique skills, ensuring your defence is as formidable as can be.

Endless Fun, Anywhere You Go:

With ten meticulously crafted maps and more added regularly, you'll always have challenges to conquer! Plus, with our commitment to frequent updates, the fun never stops.

Your Feedback Matters:

We're dedicated to making your gaming experience top-notch. If you have suggestions or encounter any issues, reach out to us at HobgoblinsAgainstDwarfs@outlook.com – your input helps us make Hobgoblins Against Dwarfs even better!

Join the Battle today:

The time for action is now! Sharpen your arrows, rally your squad, and dive into the thrilling world of Hobgoblins Against Dwarfs. Those mischievous Hobgoblins aren't going to defeat themselves – are you ready for the challenge? Let's find out!

name: Hobgoblins Against Dwarfs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Graphics: On-board graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 872 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2,4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Graphics: On-board graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 872 MB available space

short_description: Craft an unstoppable defence using Dwarven Towers and a fearless squad, then take on waves of invading Hobgoblins in this thrilling real-time strategy tower defence game! Strategize, upgrade, and triumph in Hobgoblins Against Dwarfs!
